meeting_request.purpose: Feeling down and struggling with depression and uncertainty about my next steps
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Christopher, a senior Religious Studies major. Last semester was really tough — I had to transition from a completely different major (psychology) to Religion, and it was a big adjustment. I felt really low at times, especially during the pandemic when everything felt overwhelming. Now I’m trying to figure out what’s next, and I’m still feeling a bit anxious about what I’ll do after graduation. I’m open to talking about depression, anxiety, graduation stress, or anything else related to post-graduation adjustment. I’ve talked to some professors and peers, but I’m still feeling alone in how I feel.
